name: tf-keras-nightly

chunks.text:
TF-Keras is a deep learning API written in Python,
running on top of the machine learning platform TensorFlow.

It was developed with a focus on enabling fast experimentation and
providing a delightful developer experience.
The purpose of TF-Keras is to give an *unfair advantage* to any developer
looking to ship ML-powered apps.

usage_description: This library is used to enable developers to rapidly build and deploy machine learning powered applications with ease, thanks to its fast experimentation capabilities and user-friendly interface. By leveraging TF-Keras, developers can gain a significant competitive edge in the development of ML-powered projects, allowing them to quickly ship high-quality apps that leverage the power of deep learning.
